thread.title: A great experience. Enjoyed every second of it. I would definitely recommend people to choose this hotel.
thread.title_full: A great experience. Enjoyed every second of it. I would definitely recommend people to choose this hotel. - Review of Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: fatmata123
title: A great experience. Enjoyed every second of it. I would definitely recommend people to choose this hotel.
text: Amazing location, close to tubes and buses. Great hotel, very clean and tidy. The breakfast was very tasty and healthy, which is perfect ha!! Friendly and approachable staff especially Nikki, Christal, Winnie and Marianglea. Definitely coming back here again.
